== Kuttichira (627901) ==

Kuttichira is a village in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 22183 hectares and harbouring 4558 households with total population of 17808 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Chalakudy]] is at a distance of 13 km. Male population is 8765 and female population is 9043. Scheduled Caste Population is 2543 and Scheduled Tribes population is 566. Census Location Code of the village is 627901<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
